item.title: The Fizzbuzz Problem 2
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: Last time I had stopped optimizing this the problem more because we were having a discussion where string concatination is a costly opperation. So yesterday I was talking with Nishchay how can about the previous blog and other things at that point we started on optimizing this further avoiding string contactination as well.

item.title: The Fizzbuzz Problem
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: Recently I have been giving few interviews and I have faced this problem twice or thrice I guess where an interviewer asks me this problem.

item.title: Convert Excel to Json
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: Some time in our projects we need data in json files(mostly web projects). But collecting and managing data in json files is harder(At least this is what I feel) compared to excel. I had recently ran into a similar situation where I need some data. Data is going to be provided by a non-technical person/client. And there going to be several rounds of it. So I was looking for options what can be done here, where I found several online tools which could be used for same.

item.title: Object-Oriented Programming With JavaScript (part 1)
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: I started to learn Object-oriented Programming in JavaScript using this course. This post is more of notes for the course I am taking.

item.title: Javascript uses utf16 and Html utf8, then how things work together?
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: This was part of one the discussion of dgplug discussion, that javascript uses utf-16 and html we usually use utf-8 as character encoding then how things work out. This was quite interesting on how things work around because of this. So I was reading around to find answers for the above question and I landed upon this. And this text from the answer in the link helps understand how things work.
